Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which I believe would significantly benefit you based on your needs and requirements. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $10,000 for the product. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and features it offers to you personally. I'm confident it will provide substantial return on investment for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
